courses.title: Beginner Guitar Mastery
courses.description: Learn the basics of acoustic and electric guitar with easy-to-follow lessons and practice routines.

courses.title: Piano Essentials for Adults
courses.description: A course designed for adult beginners who want to learn piano through classical and pop music.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production with Ableton
courses.description: Create EDM, house, and trap tracks using professional tools in Ableton Live.

courses.title: Vocal Training for Singers
courses.description: Develop your vocal range, tone, and technique for pop, rock, and classical music.

courses.title: Complete Music Theory Guide
courses.description: Master scales, chords, rhythm, and harmony to become a better musician and composer.
